729512f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Van Pelt Avenue
729512f-a.text:
2846 and 2856 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner of Van Pelt Avenue, showing the homes of George and John Thompson, both in the oyster business.

September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr
729512f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Van Pelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY
